sourcesContent:
<template>
  <base-form
      :submitBtnProps="submitBtnProps"
      :formFields="formFields"
      :autofocus="autofocus"
      @submit="submit"
  />
</template>

<script>
  import BaseForm from './BaseForm';
  import ForgotPasswordFormMixin from '../mixins/ForgotPasswordFormMixin';

  export default {
    mixins: [ForgotPasswordFormMixin],

    components: {
      BaseForm,
    },
    props: {
      autofocus: { type: Boolean, default: false },
    },
    data() {
      return {
        formFields: [{
          type: 'email',
          name: 'email',
          label: 'E-mail address',
          validations: 'required|email',
        }],
        statusses: {
          idle: { submitTitle: 'Send reset e-mail', color: 'secondary', dark: true },
          submitting: { submitTitle: 'Sending the reset e-mail...', color: 'default' },
          success: { submitTitle: 'Finished! Please check your e-mail.', color: 'success' },
          error: { submitTitle: 'Oops! Something went wrong...', color: 'error', dark: true },
        }
      };
    },
  };
</script>
